answers.answer: Do you go to a doctor that checks your blood sugars i go to a place called sweet sucess and.they tell me what to eat and.what i cant eat

I'm 31 weeks and I have to test my blood 4 times a day. I hate it. I eat breakfast 15 gram carbs, snack 15 grams carb, lunch 60 grams carb, snack 30 grams carb, dinner 60 grams carb, snack 15 grams carb. Its crazy. This is my first pregnancy.

question: I am 32 wks and with gest. diabetes and I have not gain any weight and now in last two weeks have been losing weight. I'm so hungry but can't eat a lot of carbs and now my calories are no where near close where they should be but if I eat more my sugar gos up. last pregnancy I did the diet and it worked this time I think I going have to do the insulin. my question is there any food that I missing thats has litle to no carbs but will have calorie intake to help stay at least at 1500.
title: weight loss..
